metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21010 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: OpenJPEG before 2.3.1 has a heap buffer overflow in color_apply_icc_profilein bin/common/color.c.

criterions.comment: gdcm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
